name: PC Recommendation System
desc: A machine learning model to recommend PC configurations using decision tree algorithm. Built using Python and Scikit-learn.

name: SensaStim Wearable
desc: An IoT-based wearable device to stimulate nerves using TENS for diabetic neuropathy and Parkinson’s. Uses sensors and health analytics.

name: Food Delivery Verification System
desc: An IoT system using QR codes and live camera feed to reduce delays during police checks for food deliveries. Ensures box transparency.

name: NotyStack Android
desc: Fully fledged Android CRUD app based on different design patterns. Built using Java, XML, SQLite, Firebase, RoomDB, MVVM.

name: Core Mate Android App
desc: A personal assistant Android app for students and musicians, featuring health tracking, habit builder, document vault, task planner, and biometric security.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal portfolio to showcase skills, education, and projects. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and hosted on GitHub Pages.

name: UmaExports-style Website
desc: Agricultural or commodity trading showcase site inspired by umaexports.net. Built with modern responsive UI design.

name: Voice Bot – Proton
desc: A smart voice assistant powered by LLaMA model that handles queries using NLP and responds with speech and text. Built for SDG-driven applications.

name: Space Habitat Monitoring System
desc: GenAI-powered assistant for astronauts to monitor health, food, material safety, and generate alerts. Built with Flask and GenAI API.

name: Skill Radar
desc: A real-time course recommendation system using ML based on NEP 2020. Built using Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and Streamlit.
